title: Successful user login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid username and password and access protected routes.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Ensure the user is redirected to the dashboard with access to protected routes

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails when incorrect username or password is submitted.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email or password
Click the login button
Verify an appropriate error message appears and access to protected routes is denied

title: Dashboard displays correct net worth summary
description: Verify the dashboard calculates and displays the correct net worth as sum of cash balances and investment NAVs.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard page
Verify net worth is displayed as total cash balances plus total investment NAVs
Verify values update correctly after portfolio, cash accounts, transactions or snapshots are updated

title: Create new investment portfolio
description: Verify user can successfully create a new investment portfolio with required details.

steps.description: Navigate to portfolio creation page
Enter portfolio details including name, asset type, platform, and strategy
Submit the form to create portfolio
Verify the new portfolio appears in the portfolios list with correct details

title: Edit existing portfolio details
description: Verify user can modify details of an existing portfolio and save changes.

steps.description: Navigate to the portfolios list and select a portfolio
Edit portfolio details such as strategy or platform
Save changes
Verify the updated details are reflected in the portfolio view

title: Delete a portfolio
description: Verify user can delete an existing portfolio and the portfolio is removed from the list.

steps.description: Navigate to portfolios list
Select a portfolio and trigger the delete action
Confirm the deletion prompt
Verify that the portfolio no longer appears in the list

title: Create and track cash account balances
description: Verify users can create and manage multiple cash accounts and balances update correctly without NAV fluctuations.

steps.description: Navigate to cash accounts page
Create a new cash account with initial balance
Verify the cash account appears with correct starting balance
Add cash transactions like deposits and withdrawals
Verify cash account balance updates accordingly without NAV changes

title: Record a buy transaction for an investment portfolio
description: Verify buy transaction records correctly reduce cash account and increase investment units, respecting business rules.

steps.description: Navigate to transactions page
Create a buy transaction with correct portfolio, amount, and linked cash account
Verify cash account balance decreases by the transaction amount
Verify investment portfolio units and cost basis update correctly

title: Record a transfer from cash to investment portfolio
description: Verify transfer transactions between cash account and investment portfolio adjust balances correctly and follow sign conventions.

steps.description: Create a transfer transaction specifying source cash account and destination investment portfolio
Verify cash balance reduces and investment portfolio balance increases accordingly
Verify transaction conforms to cash flow sign conventions

title: Create snapshot entry for investment portfolio
description: Verify user can add snapshot data recording NAV and prices at specific dates without affecting cash flows.

steps.description: Navigate to portfolio snapshots page
Enter NAV and price data for a specific date
Verify snapshot is saved and visible associated with portfolio
Verify snapshot entry does not change cash account balances

title: Manage physical gold portfolios with branded and private gold
description: Verify separate handling and tracking of quantities, prices, and profit & loss for branded and private gold under a physical gold portfolio.

steps.description: Create a physical gold portfolio
Add entries for branded gold with quantity and unit price
Add separate entries for private gold
Verify system tracks quantities and prices separately for branded and private gold
Verify profit and loss calculations are accurate and separated by gold type

title: Validate asset allocation charts reflect current data
description: Verify that allocation charts dynamically update and accurately display proportions of cash and investment assets.

steps.description: Navigate to asset allocation page
Verify donut and table charts show correct asset distribution based on current portfolio and cash data
Update portfolios and cash accounts
Verify charts immediately reflect updated data

title: Audit log entry created for financial operations
description: Verify system generates audit log entries recording all financial operations such as transactions and portfolio changes for traceability.

steps.description: Perform a financial operation (e.g., create transaction, update portfolio)
Verify audit log entry is created with correct timestamp, user ID, and operation details

title: Display error on invalid transaction data
description: Verify form validation prevents submission of transactions with invalid or missing required fields and shows user-friendly error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to new transaction form
Enter invalid transaction data (e.g., negative amount for deposit)
Attempt to submit the transaction
Verify validation error messages prevent submission and explain issues clearly

title: Restricted access blocked for unauthenticated users
description: Verify that users who are not logged in cannot access protected routes and are redirected to the login page.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate directly to dashboard, portfolios, transactions or cash accounts pages without login
Verify user is redirected to login page and access is denied

title: Verify backend net worth calculation logic
description: Test backend service calculates net worth accurately by summing cash balances and investment NAVs for specific dates.

steps.description: Invoke backend calculation service with sample portfolios and cash accounts data
Verify returned net worth matches expected calculation including all relevant data

title: Business rule validation during transaction creation
description: Verify transaction creation enforces business rules such as proper cash flow signs and portfolio boundaries.

steps.description: Submit a transaction with invalid signs or cross-portfolio inconsistencies
Verify transaction creation is rejected with a meaningful error message
